dashboard_item_ids.name: Delivery timeline
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    sp.name AS supplier_name,
    po.date_planned AS scheduled_date,
    po.date_approve AS confirmation_date,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (po.date_approve - po.date_planned)) AS date_diff_seconds
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    res_partner sp ON po.partner_id = sp.id
WHERE
    po.date_approve IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
    scheduled_date

dashboard_item_ids.name: Purchase Spend Analysis
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    sp.id AS supplier_id,
    sp.name AS supplier_name,
    pt.id AS product_id,
    pt.name AS product_name,
    COUNT(po.id) AS total_purchase_orders,
    SUM(pol.product_qty * pol.price_unit) AS total_spending
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
JOIN
    res_partner sp ON po.partner_id = sp.id
JOIN
    product_product pp ON pol.product_id = pp.id
JOIN
    product_template pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase'
GROUP BY
    sp.id, sp.name, pt.id, pt.name
ORDER BY
    sp.name, pt.name

dashboard_item_ids.name: relationship status
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    sp.id AS supplier_id,
    sp.name AS supplier_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT po.id) AS total_purchase_orders,
    AVG(pol.product_qty) AS average_quantity_ordered,
    AVG(pol.qty_received) AS average_quantity_received,
    MAX(po.date_order) AS last_purchase_order_date
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
JOIN
    res_partner sp ON po.partner_id = sp.id
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase'
GROUP BY
    sp.id, sp.name
ORDER BY
    last_purchase_order_date DESC

dashboard_item_ids.name: Cost Reduction
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    po.name AS purchase_order,
    sp.name AS supplier_name,
    po.date_order AS order_date,
    pol.product_id AS product_id,
    pt.name AS product_name,
    pol.product_qty AS quantity_ordered,
    pol.price_unit AS unit_price,
    pol.price_total AS total_amount,
    irp.value_float AS cost_price,
    (pol.price_total - irp.value_float) AS potential_cost_reduction
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
JOIN
    res_partner sp ON po.partner_id = sp.id
JOIN
    product_product pp ON pol.product_id = pp.id
JOIN
    product_template pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id
LEFT JOIN
    ir_property irp ON irp.name = 'standard_price' AND irp.res_id = 'product.product,' || pp.id
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase'
    AND (pol.price_total - irp.value_float) > 0
ORDER BY
    potential_cost_reduction DESC
dashboard_item_ids.y_axis: {"product_id":"Product id","quantity_ordered":"Quantity ordered","unit_price":"Unit price","total_amount":"Total amount","cost_price":"Cost price","potential_cost_reduction":"Potential cost reduction"}

dashboard_item_ids.name: Order Accuracy Rate
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    pol.id AS order_line_id,
    pol.product_id,
    pol.product_qty AS ordered_quantity,
    m.product_qty AS received_quantity,
    CASE
        WHEN pol.product_qty > 0 THEN (m.product_qty / pol.product_qty) * 100
        ELSE 0
    END AS order_accuracy_rate
FROM
    purchase_order_line pol
LEFT JOIN
    stock_move m ON pol.id = m.purchase_line_id
WHERE
    pol.product_qty > 0

dashboard_item_ids.name: Pending Approvals
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    id AS purchase_order_id,
    name,
    date_order,
    amount_total,
    state,
    CASE
        WHEN date_approve IS NULL THEN 'awaiting_approval'
        ELSE 'approved'
    END AS approval_status
FROM
    purchase_order

dashboard_item_ids.name: Demand Forecast Accuracy
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    pol.product_id,
    pol.product_qty AS forecasted_demand,
    SUM(m.product_qty) AS actual_demand,
    so.partner_id
FROM
    purchase_order_line pol
JOIN
    purchase_order po ON pol.order_id = po.id
LEFT JOIN
    stock_move m ON pol.id = m.purchase_line_id
LEFT JOIN
    sale_order_line sol ON pol.product_id = sol.product_id
LEFT JOIN
    sale_order so ON sol.order_id = so.id
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase' 
GROUP BY
    pol.product_id, pol.product_qty, so.partner_id

dashboard_item_ids.name: Seasonal Demand Analysis
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM po.date_order) AS order_month,
    SUM(pol.product_qty) AS total_ordered_quantity,
    SUM(m.product_qty) AS total_received_quantity
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
LEFT JOIN
    stock_move m ON pol.id = m.purchase_line_id
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase'  -- Adjust based on your criteria for including purchase orders
GROUP BY
    order_month
ORDER BY
    order_month

dashboard_item_ids.name: Urgent Procurement Requests
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    po.id AS purchase_order_id,
    po.name AS purchase_order_reference,
    po.date_order,
    po.state,
    po.partner_id,
    pol.id AS purchase_order_line_id,
    pol.product_id,
    pol.product_qty
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
WHERE
    po.state = 'sent' 
ORDER BY
    po.date_order DESC
dashboard_item_ids.y_axis: {"purchase_order_line_id":"Purchase order line id","product_id":"Product id","purchase_order_id":"Purchase order id"}

dashboard_item_ids.name: Urgent Procurement v
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    pt.name AS product_name,
    pc.name AS category_name,
    SUM(sol.price_subtotal) AS total_revenue
FROM
    sale_order_line sol
JOIN product_template pt ON sol.product_id = pt.id
 LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pt.categ_id = pc.id
WHERE
    sol.order_id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    pc.name, pt.name
ORDER BY
    total_revenue DESC

dashboard_item_ids.name: Excess and Obsolete Stock
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    pt.id AS product_id,
    pt.name AS product_name,
    sq.quantity AS current_stock
FROM
    product_template pt
JOIN
    product_product pp ON pt.id = pp.product_tmpl_id
JOIN
    stock_quant sq ON pp.id = sq.product_id

dashboard_item_ids.name: Stock Levels Monitoring
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    pp.id AS product_id,
    pt.name AS product_name,
    sq.quantity AS current_stock,
    COALESCE(SUM(sm.product_qty), 0) AS outgoing_qty,
    sq.quantity + COALESCE(SUM(sm.product_qty), 0) AS virtual_available
FROM
    product_template pt
JOIN
    product_product pp ON pt.id = pp.product_tmpl_id
JOIN
    stock_quant sq ON pp.id = sq.product_id
LEFT JOIN
    stock_move sm ON sq.product_id = sm.product_id
GROUP BY
    pp.id, pt.name, sq.quantity

dashboard_item_ids.name: Order Frequency Analysis
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', po.date_order)::DATE AS order_month,
    COUNT(po.id) AS order_count
FROM
    purchase_order po
WHERE
    po.state = 'purchase'
GROUP BY
    order_month
ORDER BY
    order_month

dashboard_item_ids.name: Compliance with Procurement Policies
dashboard_item_ids.query:
SELECT
    po.id AS purchase_order_id,
    po.partner_id,                                                                                          
    po.date_order,
    po.amount_total,
    po.state,
    pol.product_id,
    pol.product_qty,
    pol.price_unit,
    m.product_qty AS received_quantity,
    m.location_id AS source_location_id,
    m.location_dest_id AS destination_location_id
FROM
    purchase_order po
JOIN
    purchase_order_line pol ON po.id = pol.order_id
LEFT JOIN
    stock_move m ON pol.id = m.purchase_line_id
